meanings: for a while, for some time, for the time being, for the present, for now
Noun for the time being, for some time
병원에서 You should stop drinking for a while.
병원에서 Take it easy on the drinking.
병원에서 You must be on your guard against drinking.

vlive.english: I'm not going to raise princes for a while. - Are you not?

examples.korean: I’m afraid we’re temporarily out of stock. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 죄송하지만 당분간은 재고가 없습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: You can leave your suitcase here for the time being. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신 가방은 당분간 여기 두셔도 돼요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can leave your suitcase here for the time being. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ve had to put our plans on ice for the time being. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 당분간 계획을 미뤄 두어야 하는 상황이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
